Service Details: - Operates through the National Office in Ottawa, and several volunteer local branches including:  Vancouver, Victoria, Prince George and the Kootenay Region in BC- Educates and engages Canadians in support for and understanding of the United Nations and its issues which have a global impact
Cost: - Local events are generally free- Individuals can become members/supporters through contributions to the National Office
